title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat eggs with parmesan and black pepper in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta.
Quickly stir in egg mixture to coat pasta (don’t scramble eggs).

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
In a pan, sauté onions and add tomato puree.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken.
Simmer until thickened, serve with rice or naan.
